name: emacs-mcx
description: Emacs Friendly Keymap with multi cursor support, improved mark-mode experience, clipboard and kill-ring integration, and lots of improvements and bug fixes.

emacs-mcx.killRingMax.description: Maximum number of Kill Ring entries

emacs-mcx.markRingMax.description: Maximum number of Mark Ring entries

emacs-mcx.killWholeLine.description: Same to kill-whole-line variable in Emacs

emacs-mcx.strictEmacsMove.description: Simulate strictly the original emacs's cursor movements or preserve VSCode's native ones

emacs-mcx.useMetaPrefixEscape.description: If true, Escape key works as the Meta prefix.

emacs-mcx.useMetaPrefixMacCmd.description: If true, Command (âŒ˜) key works as the Meta prefix (macOS only).

emacs-mcx.enableOverridingTypeCommand.description: If true, overriding `type` command is enabled to use prefix arguments on character inputs by IME.

emacs-mcx.debug.silent.description: If true, all logs are suppressed.

emacs-mcx.debug.loggingLevelForAlert.description: Maximum level of messages to present as VS Code information window.

emacs-mcx.debug.loggingLevelForConsole.description: Maximum level of messages to log to console. Logs are visible in developer tools.
